name: Virtual City Tour
description: .Explore sydnety! https://www.youvisit.com/tour/sydney Challenge: to explore a city virtually and learn about its history, landmarks, and culture.

name: Community Service Ideas
description: Explore websites that list community service projects suitable for everyone. Challenge: to choose a service project that interests them, even if it's an online service activity.

name: Recycling and Waste Reduction
description: Use online resources to teach about recycling and reducing waste. Challenge: to create a digital poster or presentation on how to recycle and reduce waste at home.

name: Green Energy Exploration
description: Green energy is created without the use of fossil fuels. Challenge: to research a green energy source, such as solar or wind power, and create your own idea for a green energy system.

name: Urban Green Spaces
description: Explore online resources about urban parks and green spaces. Challenge them to create a vision board or design an ideal urban green space. Share your idea board with us.

name: Community Gardening
description: Explore virtual gardening or community garden websites. Challenge: to learn about the basics of gardening and create a virtual garden design or planting plan. Tell us what you would like to be involved in!

name: City Planning Game
description: Design a city of your dreams at https://icograms.com/usage-city-illustration. Challenge:to design a sustainable and eco-friendly city, making decisions about transportation, parks, and energy sources. Share your design with us here!

name: Online Sustainability Quiz
description: Create a quiz or kahoot about sustainability and eco-friendly practices using online quiz-making tools. Challenge: them to test their family or friends' knowledge. Tell us what's in your quiz!

name: Eco-Friendly Inventions
description: Design an eco friendly invention to make your life easier. Take a photo of your design or creation and using imgur upload it here!

name: Online Green Tips
description: Find and collect and share online tips for green living with friends and family, promoting simple changes to live more sustainably.

name: City Wildlife Exploration
description: Explore online resources about urban wildlife and conservation efforts. Research a local urban wildlife species and create a digital presentation.

name: Sustainable Transportation
description: Discuss the importance of sustainable transportation  and explore eco-friendly transportation options online. Challenge: to draw or describe their ideal eco-friendly vehicle.
